channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: How to make a quick’n’dirty CDC with PostgreSQL Overview At ${WORK}, I encountered multiple times some technical architectures that rely on quite powerful tools that allow us to retreive all the changes that happened to a database: it’s called a Change Data Capture. Among multiple usage, here are the three that I encountered : Data Offload: Outbox Pattern: Multiple tools exists: Debezium (de facto) What are we going to do?
